functions.name: fncBase64_Decode
functions.original_sql:
CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[fncBase64_Decode] (
    @string VARCHAR(MAX)
)
RETURNS VARCHAR(MAX)
AS BEGIN

    DECLARE @decoded VARCHAR(MAX)
    SET @decoded = CAST('' AS XML).value('xs:base64Binary(sql:variable("@string"))', 'varbinary(max)')

    RETURN CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), @decoded)
	
END
functions.mysql_sql:
DELIMITER $
CREATE FUNCTION `fncBase64_Decode` (
    @string VARCHAR(MAX)
)
RETURNS VARCHAR(MAX)
AS BEGIN

    DECLARE @decoded VARCHAR(MAX)
    SET @decoded = CAST('' AS XML).value('xs:base64Binary(sql:variable("@string"))', 'varbinary(max)')

    RETURN CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), @decoded)
	
END

$$
DELIMITER ;

functions.name: fncBase64_Encode
formatarCNPJCPF
functions.original_sql:
CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[formatarCNPJCPF]   (@CnpjCpf char(50))
RETURNS CHAR(18)

AS

BEGIN
      DECLARE @retorno VARCHAR(18)
      set @CnpjCpf = replace(replace(replace(replace(@CnpjCpf,'.',''),'-',''),'/',''),' ','')

      IF LEN(@CnpjCpf)= 14 
          --CNPJ
           BEGIN
                SET @retorno = substring(@CnpjCpf ,1,2) + '.' + substring(@CnpjCpf ,3,3) + '.' + substring(@CnpjCpf ,6,3) + '/' + substring(@CnpjCpf ,9,4) + '-' + substring(@CnpjCpf ,13,2)
           END

   ELSE
         --CPF
           BEGIN

                SET @retorno = substring(@CnpjCpf ,1,3) + '.' + substring(@CnpjCpf ,4,3) + '.' + substring(@CnpjCpf ,7,3) + '-' + substring(@CnpjCpf ,10,2) 

           END

      RETURN @retorno
END
functions.mysql_sql:
DELIMITER $
CREATE FUNCTION `formatarCNPJCPF`   (@CnpjCpf char(50))
RETURNS CHAR(18)

AS

BEGIN
      DECLARE @retorno VARCHAR(18)
      set @CnpjCpf = replace(replace(replace(replace(@CnpjCpf,'.',''),'-',''),'/',''),' ','')

      IF LEN(@CnpjCpf)= 14 
          --CNPJ
           BEGIN
                SET @retorno = substring(@CnpjCpf ,1,2) + '.' + substring(@CnpjCpf ,3,3) + '.' + substring(@CnpjCpf ,6,3) + '/' + substring(@CnpjCpf ,9,4) + '-' + substring(@CnpjCpf ,13,2)
           END

   ELSE
         --CPF
           BEGIN

                SET @retorno = substring(@CnpjCpf ,1,3) + '.' + substring(@CnpjCpf ,4,3) + '.' + substring(@CnpjCpf ,7,3) + '-' + substring(@CnpjCpf ,10,2) 

           END

      RETURN @retorno
END

$$
DELIMITER ;

functions.name: GetLocalDateTime
functions.original_sql:
CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[GetLocalDateTime]()
  RETURNS datetime
  WITH SCHEMABINDING
AS
BEGIN
  DECLARE @getdate datetime
  SET @getdate = SYSDATETIMEOFFSET() AT TIME ZONE 'E. South America Standard Time'
  RETURN @getdate
END
functions.mysql_sql:
DELIMITER $
CREATE FUNCTION `GetLocalDateTime`()
  RETURNS datetime
  WITH SCHEMABINDING
AS
BEGIN
  DECLARE @getdate datetime
  SET @getdate = SYSDATETIMEOFFSET() AT TIME ZONE 'E. South America Standard Time'
  RETURN @getdate
END

$$
DELIMITER ;

functions.name: Remove_AcentosEEspeciais
functions.original_sql:
CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[Remove_AcentosEEspeciais] ( @Texto VARCHAR(MAX) )
RETURNS VARCHAR(255)
AS BEGIN 

DECLARE @SemAcento VARCHAR(255)
    IF @texto IS NULL 
        BEGIN
            RETURN NULL
        END
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@Texto, 'á', 'a')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'à', 'a')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'ã', 'a')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'â', 'a')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'é', 'e')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'è', 'e')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'ê', 'e')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'í', 'i')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'ì', 'i')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'î', 'i')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'ó', 'o')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'ò', 'o')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'ô', 'o')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'õ', 'o')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'ú', 'u')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'ù', 'u')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'û', 'u')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'ü', 'u')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'ç', 'c')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '´', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '`', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '''', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '"', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '(', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, ')', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '[', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, ']', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '{', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '}', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '?', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '/', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '!', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '@', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '#', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '$', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '%', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '¨', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '&', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '*', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '-', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '_', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '+', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '.', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, ',', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '<', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '>', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '~', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '^', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'ª', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'º', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '§', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '¹', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '²', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '³', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '£', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '¢', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '¬', '')
    
    RETURN ( LOWER(@SemAcento) )  
   END
functions.mysql_sql:
DELIMITER $
CREATE FUNCTION `Remove_AcentosEEspeciais` ( @Texto VARCHAR(MAX) )
RETURNS VARCHAR(255)
AS BEGIN 

DECLARE @SemAcento VARCHAR(255)
    IF @texto IS NULL 
        BEGIN
            RETURN NULL
        END
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@Texto, 'á', 'a')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'à', 'a')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'ã', 'a')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'â', 'a')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'é', 'e')

    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'î', 'i')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'ó', 'o')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'ò', 'o')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'ô', 'o')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'õ', 'o')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'ú', 'u')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'ù', 'u')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'û', 'u')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'ü', 'u')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'ç', 'c')   
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '´', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '`', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '''', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '"', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '(', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, ')', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '`', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '`', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '{', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '}', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '?', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '/', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '!', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '@', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '#', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '$', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '%', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '¨', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '&', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '*', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '-', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '_', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '+', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '.', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, ',', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '<', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '>', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '~', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '^', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'ª', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, 'º', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '§', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '¹', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '²', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '³', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '£', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '¢', '')
    SELECT  @SemAcento = REPLACE(@SemAcento, '¬', '')
    
    RETURN ( LOWER(@SemAcento) )  
   END

$$
DELIMITER ;
